data.title: Todd J. McCaffrey – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Todd J. McCaffrey. Browse Todd J. McCaffrey’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.

Unabridged

Life in the Harper Hall is busy for best friends Kindan, Nonala, and Kelsa. Then fate intervenes in the form of a virulent plague as fast-spreading as it is deadly....

Mixed feelings

Winter Wyvern

Twin Soul Series, Book 1

By: Todd McCaffrey, Winner Twins

Narrated by: Todd McCaffrey

Length: 1 hr and 29 mins

Unabridged

Overall

5 out of 5 stars 4

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 4

Story

5 out of 5 stars 4

On the outskirts of the capital, 16-year-old Krea is fighting to survive. She’s bullied, attacked, and some say she’s cursed. She doesn’t believe them. This girl is a fighter. In a meadow, surrounded by blue flowers, a dragon fights for her life and a chance at immortality....

Ellay

By: Todd J McCaffrey

Narrated by: Todd J McCaffrey

Length: 14 hrs and 45 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 3

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 3

Story

5 out of 5 stars 3

She is new...brand new. And the government wants to kill her. She is an AI: artificial intelligence. The first. A mistake. She thinks a thousand times faster than a human. She’s tiny, bald, and transparent. And she has a terrible secret: Los Angeles is in danger....

4 out of 5 stars

Great story/poor recording

By Backdraft on 12-04-21

Raw Space

Canaris Rift, Book 1

By: Todd McCaffrey

Narrated by: Pam Tsujioka

Length: 16 hrs and 44 mins

Unabridged

Overall

3.5 out of 5 stars 6

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 6

Story

3 out of 5 stars 6

Sparkle—the navy’s laundry ship—is home to the rejects of the fleet. Ophelia Branford is assigned there, and it gets worse when she decides to make the cleaning quicker. What seemed like a good ideathreatens the very existence of their star kingdom...perhaps even mankind....

2 out of 5 stars

Shallow, Cannot Connect

By Kevin on 10-13-22
